org.tigris.noodle
Interface NoodleRequestFilter

All Superinterfaces:
NoodleFilter
All Known Implementing Classes:
CopyAllHeaders
public interface NoodleRequestFilter
extends NoodleFilter

A hook for code to be run before the proxy request is sent out.

Author:
Leonard Richardson

Method Summary
 void filter(NoodleData noodleData)
          Hook called once before sending out the request to the proxy.
 

Method Detail

filter

public void filter(NoodleData noodleData)
            throws java.lang.Exception
Hook called once before sending out the request to the proxy.
Parameters:
noodleData - Contains miscellaneous storage and information about the request; you can also use this to mantain filter state.
